amendatorysection.catchline: Lots; plat; care, improvement, adornment; annual exhibit; powers and duties of association.
amendatorysection.para: Such association shall cause a plat of its grounds, and of the lots by it laid out, to be made and recorded, such lots to be numbered by regular consecutive numbers. It shall have power to enclose, improve and adorn the grounds and avenues, and erect buildings for the use of the association; to prescribe rules for the enclosing and adorning of lots, and for erecting monuments in the cemetery; and to prohibit any use, division, improvement or adornment of a lot which it may deem improper. An annual exhibit shall be made of the affairs of the association.

annotation.para: This section makes definite the purposes for which expenditure of funds may be made. Root v. Morning View Cemetery Assn., 174 Neb. 438, 118 N.W.2d 633 (1962).
